Features.Name: Generate A Failures Only Report

Steps.Name: you have a test run project that creates all outcomes
you execute the dotnet test command with the failures only environment variable set to true
the project will generate an Html test run report that has only the failed scenarios
you have a test run project that does not have any scenarios
you execute the dotnet test command with the failures only environment variable set to true
the project will generate an empty Html test run report
you have a test run project that is passing
you execute the dotnet test command with the failures only environment variable set to true
the project will generate an Html test run report that has only the failed scenarios

Features.Name: Generate A Report

Steps.Name: you have a test run project that creates all outcomes
you execute the dotnet test command
the project will generate an Html test run report that has all features exercised
you have a test run project that does not have any scenarios
you execute the command
the project will generate an empty Html test run report

Scenarios.Name: With No Tests In The Project

Steps.Name: you have a test run project that does not have any tests
you execute the command
the project will generate an empty Html test run report

Steps.Name: you have executed a test run project that creates all outcomes
you can view the html report by loading the following file into your browser

Features.Name: Generate A Report

Steps.Name: you have the following json test run reports

Steps.Input: dotnet xbdd solution summarize --output MySample.TestSummary.WithFullTestRun.html --name My Sample - Features --testrun-name-clip My Sample - Features -  --reason-order Untested, Committed, Ready, Defining ./MySample.Features.TestRun1Passing/test-results/MySample.Features.TestRun1Passing.Results.json ./MySample.Features.TestRun1Passing/test-results/MySample.Features.TestRun1Passing.Results.html ./MySample.Features.TestRun2SkippedUntested/test-results/MySample.Features.TestRun2SkippedUntested.Results.json ./MySample.Features.TestRun2SkippedUntested/test-results/MySample.Features.TestRun2SkippedUntested.Results.html ./MySample.Features.TestRun3SkippedCommitted/test-results/MySample.Features.TestRun3SkippedCommitted.Results.json ./MySample.Features.TestRun3SkippedCommitted/test-results/MySample.Features.TestRun3SkippedCommitted.Results.html ./MySample.Features.TestRun4SkippedReady/test-results/MySample.Features.TestRun4SkippedReady.Results.json ./MySample.Features.TestRun4SkippedReady/test-results/MySample.Features.TestRun4SkippedReady.Results.html ./MySample.Features.TestRun5SkippedDefining/test-results/MySample.Features.TestRun5SkippedDefining.Results.json ./MySample.Features.TestRun5SkippedDefining/test-results/MySample.Features.TestRun5SkippedDefining.Results.html ./MySample.Features.TestRun6Failed/test-results/MySample.Features.TestRun6Failed.Results.json ./MySample.Features.TestRun6Failed/test-results/MySample.Features.TestRun6Failed.Results.html
